chess.core
Class Coord

java.lang.Object
  chess.core.Coord
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, java.io.Serializable
public class Coord
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constants, java.io.Serializable

Coord contains x and y coordinates for a piece's location in column and row, respectively.

Author:
Arvydas Bancewicz
